attributes.action: death by dangerous driving and whilst under the influence of drink or drugs
attributes.background: death by dangerous driving and of causing death by careless driving whilst under the influence of drink or drugs should be treated with the severity that it deserves, with a severity that matches the consequ

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about sentencing for dangerous driving, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign one of these similar petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236952
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237732
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/262126
